showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:152}); // {Cid}
“Man…it's the real thing…
I'm really here in outer space…”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:153}); // Shera
“Hurry.
I'm going to detach the escape pod.”

showWindowWithDialog({window:0, dialog:154}); // {Cid}
“Hey, Shera!
Does this pod really fly?”

showWindowWithDialog({window:1, dialog:155}); // Shera
“It'll be OK.
I've checked it.”
fade({r:0, g:0, b:0, speed:8, type:2, adjust:0});

dialogStrings: Cockpit
Engine Room
Materia Room
Ship Hallway
Duct
Escape Pod
Received Key Item "Huge Materia"!
“What're you guys doin' here?”

{Cloud}
“We heard the Captain was here.”

“Captain?
I'm the Captain!”

{Cid}
“The name's {Cid}.
Everyone calls me 'Captain', though.”

{Cid}
“What d'ya want?”
{CHOICE}Tell me about this rocket
{CHOICE}Is Rufus coming?
{CHOICE}Can we borrow the "Tiny Bronco"?

{Cid}
“Wow!
Not bad for a kid.”

{Cid}
“Alright then,
I'll explain it to you.”

{Cid}
“You know Shinra developed
a lot of technological gadgets
during the meaningless war, right?”{PAUSE}“Now it's a Mako company,
but in the old days it
was a weapons manufacturer.”

{Cid}
“Well,
they came up with a Rocket Engine.”

{Cid}
“There was so much excitement about
the thought of going into outer space.
Our dreams got bigger and bigger.”

{Cid}
“They put a major budget into it
and made prototype after prototype!
Finally, they completed Shinra No. 26.”{PAUSE}“They chose the best pilot in Shinra…
no, in the world--me.
I mean, come on.”

{Cid}
“And finally we get to the day of the launch.
Everything was goin' well…”

{Cid}
“But, because of that dumb-ass Shera,
the launch got messed up.
That's why they became so anal!”

{Cid}
“And so, Shinra nixed
their outer space exploration plans.”{PAUSE}“After they told me
how the future was Space Exploration
and got my damn hopes up…DAMN THEM!”

{Cid}
“Then, it was all over once they
found out Mako energy was profitable.
They didn't even so much as
look at space exploration.”

{Cid}
“Money, moola, dinero!
My dream was just a financial
number for them!”

{Cid}
“Look at this rusted Rocket.
I was supposed to be the first man
in space with this.”

{Cid}
“Everyday, it tilts a little bit more.”{PAUSE}“At this rate,
I don't know which'll be first,
this thing falling over or
me gettin' outta here.”

{Cid}
“Yeah! It must be news about
restarting the Space Program.”{PAUSE}“A young President,
that's what we needed!
He still has dreams, too!”

{Cid}
“You out of your *&$^$# mind!?
That's my most cherished possession.
I can't let you take it.”

{Cid}
“Ummm…
Just look around.”

{Cid}
“My last hope is
to talk to the President.”

{Cid}
“Hey! Get your ass in gear!
You work like a snail!”{PAUSE}“Even the moon'd get tired
waitin' around for your ass!”

Shera
“I'm…I'm sorry.”

{Cid}
“Don't take so much time checkin'
that *%$^# oxygen tank!”{PAUSE}"Shera, bein' careful's good,
but no matter how many times
you check that oxygen tank,
it won't matter.”{PAUSE}“That thing wouldn't break
even if hell froze over.”

Shera
“But…”

{Cid}
“No buts!!”{PAUSE}“You're not stupid,
so be more efficient!”

Shera
“I'm sorry…”

{Cid}
“Instrument panel…all clear.
Shinra No. 26, ready for launch.”

“Engine pressure rising.
Shinra No. 26, 3 minutes to launch.
Beginning countdown.”

{Cid}
“…Finally.”

{Cid}
“What the? What happened!?”

“{Cid}!
We have an emergency situation!”{PAUSE}“A mechanic is still in the
engine section of the rocket!”

{Cid}
“What!?
Who is the little ^%$@!?”

“I don't know.
Activating the intercom
in the engine section.”

{Cid}
“Hey goddammit!!
Who the &%$#'s still in there?”

Shera
“It's Shera, Captain.
Don't mind me, go ahead with the launch.”

{Cid}
“Shera!?
What are you still doin' in there!?”

Shera
“I was still concerned.
The results of the oxygen tank test
weren't satisfactory.”

{Cid}
“You stupid little $#^%!”{PAUSE}“It's gonna get so hot in there that
there ain't gonna be #$!%
left when we blast off!”{PAUSE}“You're gonna be burnt to a crisp!
You're gonna die! You know that,
doncha!?”

Shera
“I don't mind.”{PAUSE}“If I can just fix this,
the launch will be a success.
I'm almost done.”

{Cid}
“Almost done!?
You're gonna die!”

“{Cid},
We must start the countdown.
We won't make it if we don't!”

“What are you going to do, {Cid}?
If we cancel now, it'll be another
six months until the next launch!”
“Starting engine!”

{Cid}
“GODDAMMIT, Shera…
you wanna make me a murderer?”

Shera
“Tank Number 7 check is complete.
Once I complete Tank Number 8,
it's all clear.”

{Cid}
“Oh man, the moon…outer space…
my dreams…”
“Ignite Engine!”

“15 seconds until ignition.
Internal temperature rising.”

“Captain!
Our dreams are finally coming true!”

“We are so proud to be a part
of the launch of Shinra No. 26.”

“All right, Captain!
Fly our dreams into outer space!”

{Cid}
“Yeah! Leave it all to me!
I'll be back in a few!”
“We're praying for your safety!”

“Captain, preparations are complete!
All that's left is lift off!”

{Cid}
“Thanks, guys!”

{Cid}
“Hey, wait a minute!
Shera's still in here!”

Shera
“Captain!”

{Cid}
“Shera!?”

“30 seconds until ignition.
Beginning countdown.”

“{Cid}!
Forget about her.
We won't make it in time!”

{Cid}
“Come on, Shera…hurry up…
You're gonna die…”

{Cid}
“What…what am I…
What am I supposed to do?”

“You…you!
Why are you here?
Rude of the Turks should've been here!!”

{Cloud}
“Too bad.
Those guys are over there.”

“Oh man…the Turks, being done in like that…
But, I won't let you through!”
“Urrrrgh…”

“Hey! Just when I thought somethin'
was goin' on, you come back!”

{Cid}
“Hey!
What the hell're you guys doin'!?”

“Listen to me, Captain.
We're gonna launch this rocket!”

{Cid}
“Huh?
What are you talkin' 'bout?”

“We're gonna load a Materia bomb
in this and blow up Meteor.”

“Our rocket's gonna
save the planet!”

“Urrrrgh.
Man this is so COOL!!”

{Cloud}
“Wait a minute!”

{Cid}
“Shut up!!
Just shut the hell up!”

{Cid}
“How's the rocket?”
“It's pretty much OK.”
“But…”

“We planned to run it
into Meteor on Auto-Pilot, but
the most important device is broken.”

{Cid}
“Broken?
How's the repair goin'?”
“Shera's doin' it…”

{Cid}
“Oh great!
What a buncha wizards you guys are!
She's gonna take a 100 years!”

{Cid}
“I'll take over, so don't worry
about the Auto-Pilot!”

{Cid}
“Hey, go ahead!
Go tell everyone!”

“All right, Captain.
Good luck.”

{Cloud}
“Hey, {Cid}!
What're you doing!?”

{Cloud}
“There are generations of knowledge
and wisdom inside the Materia.”{PAUSE}“We're gonna borrow their powers and
save the Planet from Sephiroth.”{PAUSE}“There's no way that
we can lose the Huge Materia.
You understand that, right?”

{Cid}
“Yeah, I understand.
I understand that Materia is precious,
and I also understand what you're thinking.”

{Cid}
“But listen.”{PAUSE}“I don't give a rat's ass whether it's
science or magical power.”

{Cid}
“No, I guess if I had to choose, I'd rather
put my money on the power of science.”

{Cid}
“Humans only used to walk
around on the ground
but now they can fly!”{PAUSE}“And finally,
we're about to go
into outer space.”

{Cid}
“Science is a 'Power' created and
developed by humans.
And science just might be
what saves this Planet.”

{Cid}
“I was able to earn
my living, thanks to science.
So to me, there's nothing greater!”

{Cid}
“Now quit your worrying
'bout what Shinra's gonna do!”{PAUSE}“I don't want to regret
not having done something later.”

{Cloud}
“But, {Cid}…”

{Cid}
“Shut the hell up!!
I don't wanna hear it!!”

{Cid}
“Alright, time to get to work!
Anyone who ain't involved,
get the hell outta here!”

{Cid}
“What the hell?
What the hell happened!?”

Palmer
“Hey-hey!”

{Cid}
“Palmer!
What the hell did'ya do!?”

Palmer
“They said they finished
repairing the Auto-Pilot.
So, I laun---ched it!”

{Cid}
“Goddamn Shera!
Why'd she pick today to get fast!”

{Cid}
“DAMN! Won't even budge!
It's completely locked up!”

Palmer
“Hey-hey-hey!
Almost lift off!”

{Cid}
“What the!? No countdown!?
It just don't seem the same without it!”

Palmer
“Hey!!!!
Hey-hey!!!
Blast-----off!”

{Barret}
“Can't we do somethin'?
We can't jus' leave it.”

{Tifa}
“Can't we do something?
If it goes on, we're…”

{Red XIII}
“What should we do?
Are we all going to die?”

{Yuffie}
“Hey old man!
Do something!”

{Cait Sith}
“What shall we do?
What shall we do?”{PAUSE}“I'm a toy, so I don't care, but for
all of you it's a different story…”

{Vincent}
“We're in space now.
A long rest…”

{Cid}
“That damn Palmer went outta his way to
lock the Auto-Pilot device.
We might not be able to change course.”

{Cloud}
“…Is this the end?”

{Cid}
“Huh? What the hell're you sayin'?
You're still young,
don't give up so easily!”

{Cid}
“I'm not gonna crash into Meteor.”

{Cid}
“Just watch.”

{Cid}
“I keep an escape pod on the rocket
just for emergencies like this.”

{Cid}
“I deciphered the lock code
on the escape pod.
We'll bail right before
we crash into Meteor.”

{Cid}
“Let's see,
how's the course set?”

{Cid}
“Yup, it's headed for a collision
with Meteor.”

{Cid}
“I finally made it…
outer space…”

{Barret}
“Hey
wait a second!”{PAUSE}“What's gonna happen to
the Huge Materia?”

{Tifa}
“Hey, what about the Huge Materia?”

{Red XIII}
“But, what are we going to do with
the Huge Materia?
Are we just going to give it up?”

{Yuffie}
“Hmm? What are we gonna do
with the Huge Materia?”{PAUSE}“If you don't want it, maybe…
you could…give it to ME!”

{Cait Sith}
“By the way, what are we goin' to do
with the Huge Materia?”

{Vincent}
“Then the remaining question
is what to do with the Huge Materia.”

{Cid}
“If you want the Materia,
do whatever you want!”

{Cloud}
“…You sure?”

{Cid}
“I dunno…”

{Cid}
“I know what I said a minute ago.”

{Cid}
“But maybe all that I really wanted was
just to go into outer space.”

{Cid}
“So, why don't you all do whatever
you think is right?”

{Cid}
“The Materia should be there after
you climb that ladder.”

{Cid}
“Hey, {Cloud}.”

{Cid}
“If you're goin' to get the Materia,
it's this way.”

Shera
“The escape pod is this way.
Please hurry.”

{Cid}
“So this is…outer space…”

{Cid}
“So long,
Shinra No.26…”

{Cid}
“Man…it's the real thing…
I'm really here in outer space…”

Shera
“Hurry.
I'm going to detach the escape pod.”

{Cid}
“Hey, Shera!
Does this pod really fly?”

Shera
“It'll be OK.
I've checked it.”

{Cid}
“…
Then I'm relieved.”

Shera
“…Thanks.”

{Cloud}
“I finally found
the Huge Materia…”

{Cid}
“It's structured so that the lock can
be opened if we enter the passcode
from this control panel.”

{Cid}
“Hey {Cloud},
you know how to use it, right?”{PAUSE}“Everytime it says,
'Enter Passcode,' push
{PURPLE}[OK] [CANCEL] [MENU]{WHITE} [OR] {PURPLE}[SWITCH]{WHITE}.{PAUSE}“If you punch in the right code,
it'll unlock and you can get
the Huge Materia!”

{Cid}
“Whoa, pretty good!
You got the passcode in a single try!”

{Cid}
“You must've known the passcode.
If not, it's impossible.”

{CHOICE}{CHOICE} Passcode Input Error{PAUSE}{CHOICE} Unauthorized User Identified
Protection System will activate in 3 minutes

{Cid}
“Seems like you missed the code!”{PAUSE}“If we don't enter the correct passcode
before the protection system activates,
we won't be able to get the Materia back!”

{Cloud}
“So, what order am I supposed
to enter the passcode in?”

There is the control panel.
Try and operate it?
{CHOICE}Yes
{CHOICE}No
{CHOICE}Enter Passcode{CHOICE}
Enter Passcode 1
Enter Passcode 2
Enter Passcode 3
Enter Passcode 4

{Cid}
“I'm pretty sure that the last code was {PURPLE}[MENU]{WHITE}.
No, maybe it was {PURPLE}[CANCEL]{WHITE}…?”

{Cid}
“The second one's not {PURPLE}[MENU]{WHITE}.
I'm sure of it!”

{Cid}
“I dunno.
Just try and punch in the code randomly.”

{Cid}
“I think the first code wasn't {PURPLE}[SWITCH]{WHITE}.”

{Cid}
“I think the second code wasn't {PURPLE}[CANCEL]{WHITE}…”

{Cid}
“Code No. 3 was {PURPLE}[CANCEL]{WHITE}
…I think.”

{Cid}
“Hmm, I can't remember.
Give me some more time!”

{Cid}
“Did you use {PURPLE}[MENU]{WHITE}?
I'm pretty sure you didn't…”

{Cid}
“I have a feeling you
push {PURPLE}[OK]{WHITE} only once…”

{Cid}
“I think there was a key that
you have to push twice…”

{Cid}
“I heard there's a passcode only the
top people in Shinra know.”{PAUSE}“We probably have to enter that.
Try and enter some codes while I try
and remember that passcode!”

{Cid}
“Alright, {Cloud}!!
It's unlocked!”

{Cid}
“Yup,
my great advice saved the day.”

{CHOICE}{CHOICE} Passcode Confirmed
Identified as an Authorized User
{CHOICE}{CHOICE} Unlocked

2 minutes until activation of
the Protection System

1 minute until activation of
the Protection System
{CHOICE}   Protection System Activated{CHOICE}

{Cid}
“Ahhh &$#$#!
The Protection System just activated!”

{Cid}
“…{Cloud}, too bad,
but we gotta let it go.”

{Cid}
“ALRIGHT!
Let's get outta here while we can!”

{Cloud}
“{Cid}!!”

{Cloud}
“I'm gonna do whatever I can.”

{Cid}
“Grrrgh!”{PAUSE}“Damn!
My leg's stuck in the debris.”

{Cid}
“Don't worry 'bout me. Hurry up and go!
If you don't hurry, the rocket's
gonna crash into Meteor!”

{Cloud}
“…I can't go without my friends.”

{Cid}
“You %#@&!
No time to worry 'bout
other people!”

{Cid}
“Tank Number 8 blew up…
/
So Tank Number 8…
/
really was malfunctioning…”

{Cid}
“Shera…
/
You were right.”

{Cid}
“But,
…this is the end for me.”

Shera
“Don't say that, {Cid}.”

{Cid}
“Huh!? Shera!?”

Shera
“I tagged along.
I'm coming to help you.”

{Cid}
“You stupid &$#%!!”

{Barret}
“…Damn!
…Can't lift it!”

{Tifa}
“…I can't!
It's so heavy, I can't lift it…”

{Red XIII}
“I can't do anything
with my strength alone..!”

{Yuffie}
“I can't budge it by myself!!”

{Cait Sith}
“What shall we do?
It won't budge!”

{Vincent}
“…No.
I can't lift it.”

{Cid}
“You're stupid.
You're really $#&^%$* stupid.”

{Cid}
“…
/ …
/ Sorry.”
